Screws, Gears, and Pride

ネジ(ネジ)と(と)歯(は)車(ぐるま)と(と)プライド(プライド)NEJI to haguruma to PURAIDO

akuyurin-0001

An album featuring mothy's collaborations with uniMemo-P as "Akuyurin" released on August 15, 2009. The album is currently unavailable.

Website · Playlist · Scans

Tracklist

  1. Screws, Gears, and Pride
  2. SOUTH NORTH STORY
  3. Screws, Gears, and Pride (instrumental)
  4. SOUTH NORTH STORY (instrumental)

Notes

  • The album was illustrated by Renta.
  • The official website for the album featured a piece of prose written by mothy about the setting for the song Screws, Gears, and Pride.
